subsection.title: RNG Topic Type Shell Tutorial Step 3: Add Reference to a New Domain

body.p:
To integrate a new domain, we add the following components:
An include of the domain's RNG module file.
The domain's domains attribute contribution in the domains-att attribute group declaration.

This should seem familiar, as this is what we did in the first step of this tutorial when we adjusted the include elements to integrate the default domains into our new topic shell. We provided the URN for the modules from the entity resolution catalog for each domain.
[PROVIDE THE URN FOR THE DBPARA DOMAIN HERE]
This tutorial did not show how to package your new shell as a Toolkit plugin. For that, see .
This tutorial shows how to create a topic type shell. Creating map type shells is exactly the same.
